name: liff-experimenting
description: This is a small web application that demonstrates the basic functionality of the [LINE Front-end Framework (LIFF)](https://developers.line.me/en/docs/liff/overview/).

scripts.build-frontend: parcel build -o index.js -d public/assets/js src/frontend/index.js src/frontend/vconsole.js
scripts.build-frontend-dev: parcel build -o index.js -d public/assets/js --no-minify src/frontend/index.js src/frontend/vconsole.js
scripts.watch-frontend: parcel watch -o index.js -d public/assets/js --no-minify src/frontend/index.js src/frontend/vconsole.js
scripts.build: npm run build-frontend && npm run build-backend

author: Nawawish Samerpark
